Sentencas: In this paper, a novel 95Ag-2.5Ge-2.5Si (in wt %) filler is utilized for brazing yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolytes and commercial Crofer 22H interconnects for solid-oxide fuel cells' (SOFCs) sealing application.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution and Gas-Tight Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia/Crofer 22H Stainless Steel Brazed Joints with the Ag-Ge-Si Filler for Use in Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Before brazing, surface metallization is applied on YSZ and Crofer 22H substrates to improve the wetting performance of the filler on YSZ and Crofer 22H
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution and Gas-Tight Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia/Crofer 22H Stainless Steel Brazed Joints with the Ag-Ge-Si Filler for Use in Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells
Microstructural Evolution and Gas-Tight Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia/Crofer 22H Stainless Steel Brazed Joints with the Ag-Ge-Si Filler for Use in Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The brazing procedure is performed at 900 degrees C for 10 min under a high vacuum (similar to 10(-6) torr) to prepare sandwiched YSZ/Crofer 22H brazed coupons.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution and Gas-Tight Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia/Crofer 22H Stainless Steel Brazed Joints with the Ag-Ge-Si Filler for Use in Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The metallization mentioned above can achieve reactive wetting toward YSZ ceramics.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution and Gas-Tight Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia/Crofer 22H Stainless Steel Brazed Joints with the Ag-Ge-Si Filler for Use in Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A Si/Ti-rich oxide layer and an Fe-Cr-Si alloying phase are formed at the brazed joints' YSZ/filler and filler/Crofer 22H interfaces.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution and Gas-Tight Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia/Crofer 22H Stainless Steel Brazed Joints with the Ag-Ge-Si Filler for Use in Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: After exposure to air at 750 degrees C for 100 h, Cu and Si contents suffer from oxidation and form CuO and SiO2, respectively, in the brazed zone and the YSZ/filler interface of the joints.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution and Gas-Tight Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia/Crofer 22H Stainless Steel Brazed Joints with the Ag-Ge-Si Filler for Use in Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Fe-Cr-Si alloying phase at the filler/Crofer 22H interface is preserved without apparent oxidation.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution and Gas-Tight Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia/Crofer 22H Stainless Steel Brazed Joints with the Ag-Ge-Si Filler for Use in Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The pressure-drop test results show that the brazed joints' gas tightness does not deteriorate significantly after thermal aging, which is attributed to the good interfacial integrity of thermal-aged joints.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution and Gas-Tight Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia/Crofer 22H Stainless Steel Brazed Joints with the Ag-Ge-Si Filler for Use in Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells
